name: PRA Group, Inc.
description: PRA Group, Inc. is a global leader in the financial services industry, specializing in the acquisition and collection of non-performing loans. Founded in 1996, PRA Group operates in North America and Europe, utilizing innovative practices to improve the recovery of debts while ensuring a fair and respectful approach towards consumers. The company’s business model focuses on purchasing receivables from creditors, including banks, credit unions, and other financial institutions, and then working with consumers to find solutions for their debts. PRA Group is committed to providing a positive customer experience and employs a variety of strategies, including flexible payment options and personalized service. Over the years, the company has expanded its operations and now has a presence in multiple countries, allowing it to leverage a diverse portfolio of accounts. With an emphasis on compliance and ethical practices, PRA Group adheres to all regulations in the markets it operates in. The company also invests in technology and data analytics to optimize its collections processes and enhance operational efficiency. Through its commitment to responsible debt collection and customer service, PRA Group aims to provide financial relief and support to consumers while delivering value to its investors.

seo.meta_title: PRA Group, Inc. | Leader in Debt Recovery Services
seo.meta_description: PRA Group, Inc. specializes in the acquisition and recovery of non-performing loans, providing ethical debt collection services and innovative financial solutions.

faq.question: What services does PRA Group offer?
faq.answer: PRA Group specializes in the acquisition and collection of non-performing loans, offering services in consumer and commercial debt recovery.

faq.question: Where is PRA Group headquartered?
faq.answer: PRA Group is headquartered in Norfolk, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of PRA Group?
faq.answer: Kevin Stevenson is the CEO of PRA Group, Inc.
